description: Choosing a front-end framework can be a difficult and weighted decision. It is hard to see the viability of how it will effect your team and product over a long lived project. In this talk, I look back at how Ember.js unlocked awesome potential and productivity over the last three years and look into the future of the framework: highlighting how Ember.js has been a win for developers from junior to senior and even QA.
title: 12 Reasons I Still Choose Ember.js
